In mainland Tanzania the Arusha Declaration ushered in the policy of socialism and self-reliance.

Egypt under President Gamal Abdel Nasser had similar policies to Tanzania’s in terms of supporting armed liberation in southern Africa and it was not surprising that nearly all the liberation movements in southern Africa established offices in Cairo and Dar es Salaam.
